Currently enjoying life and developing energy management systems for sailboats.

In rouw om Nederland.

I am on the political left. I hate liars. I wish there were fewer cars around and more/better/affordable public transport. I haven’t yet given up on this planet. I love math and everything that has to do with numbers and logic.  I am an “Einzelgänger”. I am an introvert with extravert tendencies, which makes me feel very insecure.  I don’t like posting, but I like to read other people’s posts. Well, enough about me. I’m going to read about your thoughts ♥️

Européen en Limousin. Auteur 'Weg van de supermarkt' en 'het Antidieetboek'. Schrijft en vertaalt, vaak in opdracht. Gemeenteraadslid in Pittoresk Eetschrijversdorpje (F). Heet voluit Gerrit Jan (negen letters, één spatie, geen streepje). Volgt wanneer leuke interactie ontstaat. Opgeheven vingertjes mogen in een dijk of in een ander donker gat.
I am a food writer and translator living my best life in France. I post mainly in Dutch, respond in English, French and more. Trump enablers = block.
